Key Arguments: The bill will degrade public trust in government and media.
The bill's authoritarian approach will decrease trust and foster disunity.
Government-exempt content is concerning and shows contempt for the public.
The bill contradicts the principle of freedom of speech.
Notable Quotes: This proposed bill to combat 'misinformation and disinformation' must be wholly rejected.
Its authoritarian approach will decrease trust in our governments.
Such contempt for the Australian people the government is supposed to serve must be condemned.
If freedom of speech is taken away, then dumb and silent we may be led, like sheep to the slaughter.
